**We are seeking three Ph.D. students to join our lab!** 

In the first project, the successful applicant with an **experimental background**, will use ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq and Hi-C to identify and characterize the regulome of astrocytes in humans. 

In the second PhD project, the successful applicant with a **bioinformatics background**, will use and develop tools to analyze the (epi)genomes of astrocytes in humans.

In the third project, the PhD student with an **experimental background** will delineate the dynamics of the formation of CTCF-mediated loops.
 

Contact us (**a.pekowska [at] nencki.edu.pl**) and apply through the web system to Warsaw4PhD doctoral school: https://warsaw4phd.eu
